name: WEYU
additional_notices: Kindly be aware of liquidity-related risks. This notice is not directed at any project in particular, and is more of a cautionary reminder.

description.en: WEYU is the world’s first Multi-Chain Platform designed specifically for the NFT resale market. As the tokenization of items such as collectibles, art, music, content, property, and everything in-between becomes the norm, WEYU believes that the mass adoption tipping point will come from simple-to-use platforms that cater to the average internet user.
